channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for KS

item.title: Report X-2025030929
item.description:
Report X-2025030929

Identified by scraper @ 2025-03-22T21:13:09+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-03-13
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SUPERVISOR CALLED IN A LEAKER TO THE DMP AND DMP DISPATCHED A RESPONDER WITH FULL PPE AND SPILL CART. RESPONDER ARRIVED ON SCENE AND FOUND THE LEAKING PACKAGE. RESPONDER CONSULTED WITH THE DECSION TREE WHICH LED TO THE CORROSIVE RESPONSE SHEET. RESPONDER FOLLOWED THE RESPONSE CLEAN UP ON THE PAGE. BROUGHT THE LEAKER BACK TO DMP FOR PROPER DISPOSAL. LEAKER WAS PROPERLY DISPOSED OF.
